subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chris Young crushed a two-run homer Thursday, as the Mets beat the Phillies, 4-1, at Citizens Bank Park, where they were able to escape the displeasure of their home fans.
snippet: Chris Young crushed a two-run homer Thursday, as the Mets beat the Phillies, 4-1, at Citizens Bank Park, where they were able to escape the displeasure of their home fans.
